com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Interface IYRCRelatedTasksDisplayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    YRCContainerRelatedTasksDisplayer, YRCStoreRelatedTasksDisplayer

    public interface IYRCRelatedTasksDisplayer
    Instances of this interface provide the ability to display a list of related tasks in the related tasks view.
    Implementation classes should make sure that whenever a related task is clicked on the panel created by them, then the following code YRCPlatformUI.fireAction(String) needs to be invoked.
    Note for customers: This interface is needed when implementing the YRCRelatedTasksDisplayer extension point. This interface is used to display the Related tasks view.
    Implement the extension point only if you need to override the way the existing related tasks view is displayed.
    Note: If more than one implementation of the YRCRelatedTasksDisplayer extension point is found then one of the implementation is randomly chosen and used.
    See Also:
    YRCRelatedTask

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getRelatedTasksPanel(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent, java.util.ArrayList relatedTasks)
      Method that gets invoked whenever the related tasks view needs to be updated with a new set of tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • getRelatedTasksPanel

        org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getRelatedTasksPanel(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList relatedTasks)
        Method that gets invoked whenever the related tasks view needs to be updated with a new set of tasks.
        Note: The following processing is done prior to invoking this method:
        • The related tasks list is pre-sorted based on the associated task group and the sequence number of the group.
        • Related tasks list is filtered based on permission defined.
        • Related tasks (Non extended tasks) list is filtered by invoking YRCEditorPart.acceptTask(YRCRelatedTask)
        • Related tasks added through extensibility are filtered by invoking IYRCRelatedTasksExtensionContributor.acceptTask(YRCEditorInput, YRCRelatedTask)
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent composite using which the Related Tasks panel needs to be created.
        relatedTasks - The list of related tasks which need to be displayed.
        Returns:
        The composite to be displayed on the related tasks view.
        See Also:
        YRCRelatedTasksGroup, YRCRelatedTasksCategory, YRCEditorInput, IYRCRelatedTasksExtensionContributor
